title: Timothy Leary - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/7/21
itunes:title: Timothy Leary - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/7/21
description:
George Noory and documentary filmmaker Paul David explore the life of LSD researcher Timothy Leary, his cultural legacy and plans to have his head frozen after he died, and how his arrests for drug possession in the 1960s compares to drug laws today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
